tool_description: Creates preventive maintenance schedules for HVAC equipment based on manufacturer recommendations and operational requirements.

equipment_ids.description: List of equipment IDs to schedule

schedule_horizon_days.description: Number of days to schedule ahead (30-365)

maintenance_interval_override.description: Override default maintenance interval in days (7-180)

preferred_days.description: Preferred days of week for maintenance (monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday)

error_messages: Invalid equipment ID: One or more equipment IDs not found in the system database.
Invalid schedule horizon: schedule_horizon_days must be between 30 and 365 days.
Invalid maintenance interval: maintenance_interval_override must be between 7 and 180 days if specified.
Invalid preferred days: Use valid day names (monday through sunday).
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Invalid date format: All dates must be in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide equipment_ids, schedule_start_date, and schedule_horizon_days. Optionally customize with maintenance_interval_override, preferred_days, exclude_dates, and priority_level to generate optimized maintenance schedules.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated schedule

total_tasks_scheduled.description: Total number of maintenance tasks created

equipment_coverage.description: List of equipment IDs included in the schedule
